hero.title: We Are Quest
hero.subtitle: At Quest, we blend strategy, creativity, and data to help ambitious brands grow. From SEO and content to performance marketing and analytics — we craft digital experiences that deliver real results and lasting impact.

story.title: Our Journey
story.description: Founded in 2025, Quest was born from a bold vision: to help brands navigate the fast-changing digital landscape with clarity, creativity, and purpose. Our founders saw an opportunity to merge innovative thinking with data-driven strategy, helping businesses grow not just bigger — but smarter. In a short time, we've partnered with forward-thinking clients across industries to deliver impactful campaigns that spark engagement, drive performance, and build lasting brand loyalty. At Quest, we don't just follow trends — we lead the way with solutions that are built for tomorrow.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to empower businesses by delivering powerful marketing solutions that combine creativity, data, and technology. We partner with our clients to build memorable brands, drive growth, and connect with their audience across every platform.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted and innovative marketing agency in the region, transforming brands into market leaders through creativity, strategy, and measurable impact.

values.title: What Drives Us
values.subtitle: Our core values shape everything we do and guide us in creating exceptional work for our clients.

strategic.title: Strategic Thinking
strategic.description: Every campaign begins with insight and intention — we build with purpose, backed by data.

creative.title: Creative Innovation
creative.description: We challenge conventional marketing with fresh ideas that spark emotion and action.

collaborative.title: Client Partnership
collaborative.description: We grow together. Collaboration and transparency are at the core of every success story we create.

agility.title: Agility
agility.description: In a fast-moving digital world, we stay adaptable and ahead of the curve — always learning, testing, and evolving.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: From strategy to execution, we hold ourselves to the highest standards to deliver work that makes an impact.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The creative minds behind every successful campaign. We're passionate professionals who love what we do.

hero.title: What We Can Do
hero.subtitle: From bold strategies to flawless execution, Quest delivers marketing solutions that drive growth and turn brands into success stories.

socialManagement.description: We manage your social media platforms with strategic planning, publishing, and engagement to grow your audience and build brand loyalty.

socialDesign.description: Eye-catching, brand-aligned social media creatives designed to capture attention and increase engagement across all platforms.

mediaBuying.title: Media Buying
mediaBuying.description: Maximize ROI with data-driven media buying strategies that place your brand in front of the right audience at the right time.

webDev.description: Custom, responsive websites that combine sleek design with powerful functionality — built to convert and scale with your business.

mediaProduction.title: Media Production
mediaProduction.description: Professional video and photography production tailored to tell your brand story and connect with your audience on a deeper level.

publicRelations.title: Public Relations
publicRelations.description: Build a credible, visible brand through strategic PR that amplifies your voice across media outlets, influencers, and online platforms.

contentCreation.title: Content Creation
contentCreation.description: We craft impactful content — from copy to visuals — that drives conversations, clicks, and conversions.

seo.title: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
seo.description: Boost your visibility and traffic with powerful SEO strategies built to rank your website on search engines and generate quality leads.

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.description: Dedicated account managers who serve as your strategic partners — ensuring smooth communication, reporting, and execution of all campaigns.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: How we work with clients to deliver exceptional results through a proven methodology.

discovery.title: Discovery & Strategy
discovery.description: We begin by understanding your brand, goals, audience, and challenges — then develop a tailored strategy to guide all efforts.

planning.title: Creative Planning
planning.description: Our team crafts content ideas, design direction, and messaging strategies that align with your vision and market positioning.

execution.title: Execution & Production
execution.description: From social media design to website development and media production, we bring the strategy to life with precision and creativity.

launch.title: Launch & Optimization
launch.description: Campaigns go live! We monitor performance in real-time, making data-driven adjustments to maximize impact.

reporting.title: Reporting & Growth
reporting.description: We provide clear, insightful reports — and use those insights to evolve and scale your success over time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services and process.
faq.question1: How long does a typical project take?
faq.answer1: Project timelines vary based on scope and deliverables. For example, a social media campaign can launch within 3-5 Days, while website development may take 1 week. We provide a clear timeline upfront for every project, and we stick to it.
faq.answer2: Each package is tailored to your brand's needs. Our services typically include strategy development, creative production, platform management, and performance reporting, Media Buying, Branding. Whether you're looking for full-service digital marketing or a single solution, we've got you covered.
faq.question3: Do you work with small businesses or startups?
faq.answer3: Absolutely! We're passionate about helping startups and small businesses grow. Our flexible packages and collaborative approach make it easy for any brand to access world-class digital marketing — regardless of size.
faq.answer4: At Quest, we combine creativity, strategy, and data to deliver work that performs — not just looks good. Our team becomes an extension of yours, providing personalized support, full transparency, and results that speak for themselves.
faq.answer5: We offer flexible payment options depending on the scope of work — including monthly retainers, milestone-based billing, or project-based fees. You'll always receive a clear proposal and agreement before we begin.
faq.question6: Do you offer ongoing support after launch?
faq.answer6: Yes, we do. Whether it's social media management, SEO monitoring, website updates, or content creation, we offer retainer-based support packages to ensure your digital presence stays fresh and effective.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Don't wait – let's discuss your goals and create a strategy that drives real results.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Quest Digital Marketing Agency ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect includes:

items.name: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
items.email: Email address for communication and service delivery

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.intro: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

items.respond: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer service
items.services: To deliver and improve our marketing services
items.improve: To analyze and improve our website and services
items.communicate: To communicate with you about our services and updates
items.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

items.consent: With your explicit consent or at your direction
items.legal: To comply with legal obligations or respond to legal requests
items.business: In connection with a business transfer or merger

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

items.access: The right to access and receive a copy of your personal information
items.correct: The right to correct or update your personal information
items.delete: The right to delete your personal information
items.restrict: The right to restrict the processing of your personal information
items.object: The right to object to the processing of your personal information

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. Some features of our website may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.subtitle: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Quest Digital Marketing Agency's services and website.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Quest Digital Marketing Agency. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our website and services. By accessing our website or engaging our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

services.title: Services Description
services.intro: Quest Digital Marketing Agency provides comprehensive digital marketing services including but not limited to:

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.intro: As a user of our services, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use our services in a lawful manner
items.materials: Ensure you have rights to any materials provided to us

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment terms are specified in individual service agreements. Generally, our payment terms include:

invoicing.title: Invoicing and Payment
invoicing.content: Invoices are issued according to the agreed schedule. Payment is due within 30 days of invoice date unless otherwise specified.

late.title: Late Payments
late.content: Late payments may result in service suspension and additional fees. We reserve the right to charge interest on overdue amounts.

ownership.title: Our Intellectual Property
ownership.content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property on our website and in our services remain the property of Quest Digital Marketing Agency unless otherwise specified.

client.title: Client-Provided Materials
client.content: You retain ownership of materials provided to us, but grant us a license to use them for the agreed services.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Resources
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party resources in our services. Usage rights and licenses for such resources are governed by their respective terms.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: We respect the confidentiality of your business information and will not disclose confidential information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or as necessary to provide our services.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the specific service in question. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. We do not guarantee specific results from our marketing services as results depend on various factors beyond our control.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate services with appropriate notice as specified in the service agreement. Upon termination, you remain responsible for payment of services rendered up to the termination date.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Egypt. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be resolved in the courts of Cairo, Egypt.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

whatsapp.defaultMessage: Hello! I'm interested in your digital marketing services.
